title: MD
biography: Praveen Gupta is an Indian first-class cricketer who plays for Uttar Pradesh. A slow left-arm bowler, he has played cricket across all three formats of the game for Uttar Pradesh and Manipal Tigers.
aiSummary: Praveen Gupta is a stroke & neurocritical care specialist with an H-index of 54 at Neurology (Member). Has been published in Cell Death and Disease, Journal of Cellular Biochemistry, Molecular and Cellular Endocrinology. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
